hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bear Transition on Regulatory News Shock with Volume Profile Break
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regime, if major negative regulatory news emerges (MiCA enforcement, exchange crackdown) AND BTC breaks below its Volume Profile Point of Control (POC) on >200% average volume, a transition to BEAR regime occurs within 3 days with 80% probability, with immediate -15% average decline over 5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes lack strong directional conviction, making them vulnerable to exogenous shocks. Volume Profile POC represents high-volume equilibrium - breaking it with news catalyst triggers algorithmic selling and stops. Regulatory news has asymmetric impact during uncertain regimes.
entry_conditions: Major negative regulatory news headline (verified by sentiment analysis < -0.7)
BTC price breaks below daily Volume Profile POC (30-day lookback)
Crypto Fear & Greed Index drops > 20 points in 24 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: Short position: 20% profit OR regime transitions to BEAR with confidence > 75%
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Short position: 8% loss OR BTC reclaims POC with volume

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If regulatory+POC breaks during NEUTRAL lead to BEAR transition < 55% of time OR average 5-day decline < -7%
